parameters.content:
## v1 Helper

ℹ️ This workflow is to be run **after upgrading to n8n v1**.

This workflow returns all locations where a node in an active workflow contains a parameter using an **expression extension affected by [v1 changes]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} For every location, please check that the workflow still behaves as intended.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

description: Automated workflow: v1 helper - Find params with affected expressions. This workflow integrates 4 different services: stickyNote, manualTrigger, n8n, code. It contains 4 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.
